summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposal of Jack D. Mayo, Mr. and Mrs. James A. Johnson, Quimby-Adams, Inc. and D.E. Construction, and Cascade Pacific Development Corporation, to purchase and develop parcels in the Leschi Neighborhood Development Project, Wash. A-2-1; authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver deeds; authorizing the Director of Housing and Neighborhood Development to administer the "Contract for Sale of Land"; designating disposition of such proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
